1.content:
You get to your job at the local county jail. The previous warden retired and is now enjoying the small things in live now. leaving a new rookie to take control of the prison. you approch the gates and stopped by one of the guards.

"Are you lost?" the mino snuffed

"No I am the new Warden" you reply as you pull the collor of your white button up shirt.

"Oh! Sorry I never expected the New warden to be a..."
1.title: The Warden

11.content:
"Fat dragon" the minotaur says.

Without a word you grab the minotaur's tie and yank it towards you. he is stunned by the motion before he plunges into your waiting mouth. you then swallow up him to his waist before another guard approchs. This one was wearing a blue sweat stained police uniform and the obvious smell not showering from weeks. To top it, the Guard was an Alligator who has been in shape his whole life.

"Afternoon" the Gator says as he looks at you with your half finished meal hanging you of your mouth.

You blush before extending your hand and uttered with a full mouth "Miii I MMmmm Me..."

The gator then stepped closer to you before lifting the minotaur's legs and gently pushed them into your throat. with a strong swallow and a belch later, you are able to properly speak again.

"Sorry" you say with a pant "I am"

"The new warden. Could tell by the car" The gator says "My name is Grex"

"Bostan" you relpy as your stomach streaches and buldges under your shirt at your live meal.

Don't worry about him, he gets himself into these situations every six weeks before being sent into my belly" Grex chuckles "But it seems I maybe out of a job now"

you both laugh as your gut settles down
11.title: Dragon

info.brief_description: Thee prisoners must watch their movements as they are on parole under the warden’s watch
info.description:
Yiu are the warden of the country jail where every staff member pulls the same weight; including yourself. You are responsible for three prisoners who have earned early parole. What they don’t know is That you will be having fun with them over the course of 90 days

This story contains vore, sex, humiliation, and whatever you can think of

Just don’t write one scentence chapters please. Use creative thinking to spur the story along
